import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useCartContext } from "./context/CartContext.jsx"; const Cart = () => { const {cart} = useCartContext() const {deleteFromCart} = useCartContext() const [contrador2, setcontrador2] = useState(0) const estoImprime = () => { console.log('esete es el carrito ',cart); } useEffect(() => { setcontrador2 (cart.reduce((a,v) => a = a + v.quantity , 0 )) }, [{contrador2}]); console.log(contrador2); const borrarDelCarrito = (id) => { //const findProduct = cart.find((producto) => producto.id === prod.id) console.log('Este es el producto a borrar',id); if (!1) { alert("Error") return } deleteFromCart() } return (
